description: Holly Heart returns to Whipped Ass with an explosive performance and great chemistry with Bella Rossi. Holly plays a youthful divorcee trying to put the pieces back together while staying at an old friend's house. Bella has many secrets which unbeknownst to Holly is going to put her right smack dab in the middle of a twisted, sadistic lesbian love affair. Bondage, punishment, ass licking, multiple orgasms, hard strap-on fucking and fisting are all included.
title: Friends Forever
